unnormalised: Arre yaar, Mrs. Sharma-che dhuvek lagin zalem! Aikullam kitli dhobaryachi karyavoll asli mhunn. Mr. ani Mrs. Verma pan thaim asle, ekdom shringar korun. Kumar bhau-nui darshan dilem, barech lok aile asle, haina? Mhaka vochpak mellonk naslem, punn kamant gunthlolom. Devan dis dilear, mhaka soglleank mevpak mellttlem.
normalised: Arre yaar, Missus Sharma-chea dhuvyek lagin zallem! Aikolem mhunn mottea dobaryaan aslem. Mister ani Missus Verma-i asle, ekdom bore dixtti podtale. Kumar bhai-nui yetalo, bori social gathering asli, na? Maka vochunk mellonk zai aslem, punn kamak lagun mellonk na. Ashaa asa, saglleank vegllean mellttolom.
